body.raw:
{
  "name": "'Тестовый EcomTest'",
  "code": "Тестовый товар",
  "brand_id": {{dict_brands}},
  "category_id": {{dict_categories}},
  "made_in_country_id": {{dict_countries}},
  "description": "Товар создан для проверки автоматизации",
  "season_id": 1,
  "vat_rate": 0.2,
  "width": 100,
  "height": 200,
  "depth": 300,
  "weight": 400,
  "unit_id": 1,
"suppliers": [
    {
      "contragent_id": {{dict_contragents}},
      "incoming_price": {{incoming_price}},
      "rrp": {{rrp}},
      "codes": [
        {
          "code": "Тестовый код"
        }
      ],
      "packaging": [
        {
          "packagingtype_id": {{dict_packagingtypes}},
          "barcode": "{{goods_suppliers_barcode}}",
          "unit_quantity": 1,
          "weight": 100,
          "width": 200,
          "height": 300,
          "depth": 400
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
